response.original_title: Love Trap with My Dashing Knight
response.overview: In Love Trap with My Dashing Knight movie, the wealthy heiress Emily White marries Tim Carter, a man from humble beginnings, for love. She spares no effort in elevating him to the position of CEO, using her familyâ€™s vast resources to secure his success. Yet, after ten years of marriage, Tim betrays her, secretly engaging in an affair with his secretary, Laura Green. Stripped of power, Emily is reduced to a housewife, trapped in a hollow, loveless marriage, suffering alone.
response.title: Love Trap with My Dashing Knight
